001package com.technototes.library.subsystem.motor;
002
003import com.technototes.library.hardware.motor.Motor;
004import com.technototes.library.subsystem.DeviceSubsystem;
005
006/** Class for motor subsystems
007 * @author Alex Stedman
008 * @param <T> The motor type
009 */
010public class MotorSubsystem<T extends Motor<?>> extends DeviceSubsystem<T> {
011
012    /** Create motor subsystem
013     *
014     * @param motor The motor
015     */
016    public MotorSubsystem(T motor) {
017        super(motor);
018    }
019
020    /** Get the speed of the motors in the subsystem
021     *
022     * @return The speed
023     */
024    public double getSpeed() {
025        return getDevice().getSpeed();
026    }
027
028    /** Set the speed of the primary motors in subsystem
029     *
030     * @param speed The speed
031     */
032    public void setSpeed(double speed) {
033        getDevice().setSpeed(speed);
034    }
035
036    public void stop() {
037        setSpeed(0);
038    }
039}
